title: Industry Nine Teases Unreleased SOLiX Hubs & Carbon AR40 Wheels at CORE Bike
content:
Industry Nine shows 5-Pawl SOLiX Road hubs and all-new AR40 carbon wheels for all-road and fast gravel

Read the full article at Industry Nine Teases Unreleased SOLiX Hubs & Carbon AR40 Wheels at CORE Bike on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
